sub_title: Associate prof. in med. physics at Academic Medical Center
summary:
Curriculum vitae Nico A.M. Schellart.				Maart 2007

Geboren te Amsterdam, 3/5/1946, Ned. nationaliteit, gehuwd.. 
1970 doct. Biologie, Uva (cum laude)
1973 promotie (UvA)
Laatste ca. 15 jaar UHD, Biomed EnG & Physiscs 

Onderzoek
After receiving his Mr. Sc. degree in Biology at the University of Amsterdam (UvA) he was active in the research of the processing of visual information in the ganglion cells of the fish retina, resulting in a Ph.D. degree in 1973 from the UvA. From 1973 he has been with the Laboratory of Medical Physics of the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Amsterdam working as an assistant-professor and later as associate professor. His research broadened to sensory information processing in the fish brain for the visual and auditory system, and especially the interaction between these systems, which also including anatomical and behavior research, and development of instrumentation. Also, he studied the performance of the human visual system and brain under hypoxic and hyperoxic laboratory and field condition. Since 1997 he was conducting a small research group involved in basic and clinical MEG and EEG research of the human visual, auditory and sensory-somatic system.
Ca. 40 publicaties (ongeveer de helft als 1ste auteur), vrijwel allen SCI (Hirsch factor 15) en 10 hoofdstukken in int. handboeken. Ca. 80 abstracts (meestal als 1ste auteur). Invited lectures etc. Gastdocent Un. Lisboa, Campo Grande

Associate ed. Med and Biol Engin. and Comput.


Als activiteit in de vrije tijd wordt de duikgeneeskunde/fysiologie  en hypobare fysiologie beoefend. Is actief lid van de Ned. Ver. Duikgnsk en de Undersea Hypermed Soc. Gaf o.a. de 1ste Ned. Cursus Duikgeneeskunde. Daarna nog diverse cursussen duikgeneeskunde (capita) . Is gecommitteerde van de NVD ter beoordeling van de kwaliteit door haar gegeven cursussen (docenten, syllabi, toetsing, en de officieuze certificering als duikerarts(-specialist).

Specialties: Pubicatielijst Original papers van NAM Schellart
44  publicaties, waarvan 29 maal als 1ste auteur. 

Last one
Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment Improved Neurophysiologic Performance in Brain Tumor Patients After Neurosurgery and
Radiotherapy A Preliminary Report, Nico A. M. Schellart, PhD1; Dik Reits, PhD1; Adrian J. van der Kleij, MD2; and Lukas J. A. Stalpers, MD3, , Cancer, April, 20`12
